trans-unit.source: When you provision a MongoLab database, MongoLab transmits a connection URI to Azure in MongoDB's standard connection string format.
trans-unit.target: When you provision a MongoLab database, MongoLab transmits a connection URI to Azure in MongoDB's standard connection string format.

trans-unit.source: This value is used to initiate a MongoDB connection through your choice of MongoDB driver.
trans-unit.target: This value is used to initiate a MongoDB connection through your choice of MongoDB driver.

trans-unit.source: For more information about connection strings, see [Connections](http://www.mongodb.org/display/DOCS/Connections) at mongodb.org.
trans-unit.target: For more information about connection strings, see [Connections](http://www.mongodb.org/display/DOCS/Connections) at mongodb.org.

trans-unit.source: This URI contains your database user name and password.
trans-unit.target: This URI contains your database user name and password.

trans-unit.source: Treat it as sensitive information and do not share it.
trans-unit.target: Treat it as sensitive information and do not share it.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve this URI in the Azure Portal using the following steps:
trans-unit.target: You can retrieve this URI in the Azure Portal using the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Locate your MongoLab service in your add-on list.
trans-unit.target: Locate your MongoLab service in your add-on list.

trans-unit.source: Cick the name of your add-on to reach the add-on page.
trans-unit.target: Cick the name of your add-on to reach the add-on page.

trans-unit.source: Click the clipboard button to the right of the MONGOLAB_URI value to copy the full value to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Click the clipboard button to the right of the MONGOLAB_URI value to copy the full value to the clipboard.
